QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, note_date, case when encid = '' or encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, substring(drug_name, 1, 250) as drug_name, reason_general, 'NLP_DRUG_RATIONALE' as note_title, note_section, 'drug_name:' + isnull(drug_name, '') + ';drug_action:' + isnull(drug_action, '') + ';drug_action_preposition:' + isnull(drug_action_preposition, '') + ';reason_general:' + isnull(reason_general, '') + ';sentiment:' + isnull(sentiment, '') + ';sentiment_who:' + isnull(sentiment_who, '') as note_text, 40639387 as language_concept_id, CASE WHEN drug_action in ('TAKE', 'START', 'ADMINISTER', 'MEDICATE') and drug_name is not null and sentiment is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Drug from {sc}.nlp_drug_rationale JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(replace(ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
